r.d: Internationalization extension implements ICU library functionality in PHP.
r.n: - Fixed build on PHP 5.5+. - Bring error reporting in converter more in line with the rest. - Fix parameter parsing in Uconverter::convert() for PHP 5.5. - Fix intlcal_get_time_zone() not setting local error. - Fix arginfo for BreakIterator::getLocale(). - Fixed compiler warnings.
